edit_history.change_in_position: Buzzer buzzed on the correct answer for the first time

0.buzzer_string: This composer visited the country of Japan, where he composed the suite based on Mexican folk music. He also formed a friendship with the Mexican composer Carlos Chavez to whom his second symphony is dedicated. This composer also composed the opera The Tender Land and later wrote the orchestral work Connotations. This man's third and final symphony was premiered by Serge Koussevitzky and its final movement forms the basis for his Fanfare for the common
0.most_important_sentence: This composer also composed the opera The Tender Land and later wrote the orchestral work Connotations.
